reviewText: This is an old standby for when I want to do some Hatha Yoga. My first love is Kundalini Yoga but once in awhile when I really am in the mood for some plain old sun salutes and chaturangas - power yoga with Rodney is the place to go! Rodney has a very nice delivery and no nonsense style that I really appreciate. I also appreciate that the tape is short enough that I can get my yoga in during a busy day.
